text: Little Big Man is a 1970 Western-comedy movie. It is about Native Americans and American pioneers in the 19th century. Also in 19th century, a white male child is raised by the Cheyenne people. Dustin Hoffman plays Jack Crabb. Faye Dunaway plays Louise Pendrake. Little Big Man was released on December 23, 1970. It was based on the book by Thomas Berger. The movie got very positive reviews from critics. Roger Ebert gave the movie four stars. It was rated GP by the MPAA.
